com.team23.weather

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team23.weather.App

  • public class App
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the main backend of the application. It acts as a singleton and is largely not-threadsafe, unless indicated. A reference to this object is given to every top-level UI element, so that it can communicate with the backend.
    Author:
    Saquib Mian

    • Method Detail

      • registerObserver

        public void registerObserver(ILocaleObserver lo)
        Register a new locale observer. This observer will be triggered on locale changes.
        Parameters:
        lo - the observer

      • registerObserver

        public void registerObserver(ILocationObserver lo)
        Register a new location observer. This observer will be triggered on location changes.
        Parameters:
        lo - the observer

      • registerObserver

        public void registerObserver(IWeatherDataObserver wdo)
        Register a new weather data observer. This observer will be triggered on weather data changes.
        Parameters:
        wdo - the observer

      • registerErrorHandler

        public void registerErrorHandler(IErrorHandler eh)
        Register a new error handler. This handler will be triggered when errors occur.
        Parameters:
        eh - the error handler

      • searchForCity

        public Location[] searchForCity(java.lang.String query)
        Searches for a city in OWM and returns an array of results. This method is thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        query - the name of the city and/or country, like so: 'city,country'
        Returns:
        an array of Location results

      • getWeatherData

        public WeatherData getWeatherData()
        Load the weather data, if it is not already loaded. Note that if a location has not been chosen as yet, this method will return a valid WeatherData object with no location-specific weather data. This method is thread-safe.
        Returns:
        a WeatherData object

      • refreshWeatherData

        public void refreshWeatherData(Location location)
        Force a refresh of all weather data, including Mars data. This method will fire any relevant observers. Note that this method will only update Mars data if no location is set.
        Parameters:
        location - the location to get the weather for

      • saveLocation

        public void saveLocation(Location location)
        Sets the location and updates any weather, and persists the change. Any ILocationObservers are fired. This method is thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        location - the new location

      • setLocaleSettings

        public void setLocaleSettings(LocaleSettings localeSettings)
        Sets the locale settings and fires any ILocaleObservers. This method is thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        localeSettings - the new locale settings

      • saveConfiguration

        private void saveConfiguration(Configuration toSave)
        Persist the user preferences This method is thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        toSave - the new configuration model

      • getConfiguration

        public Configuration getConfiguration()
        Reads the user preferences This method is thread-safe.
        Returns:
        the persisted configuration model
